## Overview


A2munge was built to address the following 

* add missing spark based data processing functionality
* create programatic interface using standard evaluation^[dplyr standard evaluation intro [via](https://dplyr.tidyverse.org/articles/programming.html)] to dplyr verbs^[dplyr intro [dplyr](https://dplyr.tidyverse.org/)]
* simplify combine many dplyr verbs into single function for ease of use
* create consistent outputs
